body_html:
Hi, @peterjc123 I face the following error when running this command in python "from warpctc_pytorch import CTCLoss". I have followed the steps to install as you told me before to install warp-ctc. Can you feel free to have a look ?

Attached here is my cpu build warp-ctc.
warp-ctc.zip
https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc
Thank you.

body:
Hi, @peterjc123 I face the following error when running this command in python "from warpctc_pytorch import CTCLoss". I have followed the steps to install as you told me before to install warp-ctc. Can you feel free to have a look ?
![error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30174905/33589043-32fe6586-d9b1-11e7-81d0-43feef65471a.PNG)
Attached here is my cpu build warp-ctc. 
[warp-ctc.zip](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1529615/warp-ctc.zip)
https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc
Thank you.
